resolved.description: Initial motor selection exceeds all budgets significantly
resolved.resolution_approach: Rebalance global budgets based on actual hardware requirements

resolution_details.justification: Conservative initial budgets were insufficient for functional 30 DOF humanoid. After optimization to 24 DOF with gearboxes and brushless motors, design fits within rebalanced budgets.
resolution_details.budget_source: Skeleton came in at 54.5% of original budget (8.18kg vs 15kg), allowing 7kg reallocation to actuation. Cost budget increased by reallocation from sensing, shell, and power reserves.

resolved.notes: Actuation design with 24 DOF is functional and appropriate. Optimization successfully reduced from initial 30 DOF bloat. System now ready for remaining subsystems (power, sensing, shell).
